items.title: BitGo S-1 Shows $4.19 billion H1 2025 Revenue and Over $90 billion in Crypto
items.excerpt: BitGo's S-1 filing outlines plans for an NYSE listing under the ticker BTGO and reports strong first-half financials, while disclosing platform scale and asset concentration as of midâ€‘2025. The filing also details governance features and intended uses of proceeds amid a changing crypto market backdrop.
